p: Influenza virus has been associated with mortality and morbidity in chronic lung diseases ( Harper et al., 2009). A meta-analysis showed that influenza vaccination prevented exacerbations in COPD patients ( Poole et al., 2000) and reduced the mortality and morbidity in elderly persons ( Nichol et al., 2007). Anti-viral treatment such as neuraminidase inhibitors may reduce the severity of disease ( Kaiser et al., 2003). Thus, treatment to prevent influenza has been recommended for COPD patients ( Harper et al., 2009).
